metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7508 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the bmp_decode_rle function in libnsbmp.c in Libnsbmp 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via the last row of RLE data in a crafted BMP file.

criterions.comment: libnsgif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
